name: css-font-face-src
description: A CSS @font-face src property value parser

scripts.test: jshint lib/ --exclude lib/grammar/index.js test/ && jasmine-node test/ --captureExceptions
scripts.dist: browserify --standalone cssFontFaceSrc lib/index.js | derequire > dist/css-font-face-src.js && phantomjs test/loadPage.js test/dist_test.html | grep font.woff
